title: Drake's emoji tattoo and Chris Hemsworth's hacker â it's all today's pop culture as it happens | Culture | The Guardian
summary: a definitive guide to pop culture man buns .
breaking : thom yorke takes on the internet .

documents.title: tomorrow 's guide today !
text: tomorrow 's cover .
guide look , it 's tomorrow 's issue , with that bloke who directed fight club on the front .
pick it up in all good newsagents ( and some bad ) it 'll be fun .
that 's it from us so if you want to know what to do this weekend you , um , know what to do .

documents.title: a definitive guide to pop culture man buns
text: messenger of man buns .
garten/ap 2014 has been many things so far but where the shiny tops of the pop culture male 's head is concerned , the year of the man bun is absolute .
somewhere , somehow , someone unrolled their fortune cookie and it decreed that buns were no longer just for girls , or samurais , but for men .
mainly celebrity men .

lately , they 've been atop the heads of everyone from leonardo dicaprio who sported one for his un speech earlier this week to thom yorke , who 's got one in the new video for his new track ( see below ) .
hair unaware ?
unsure how to navigate the man bun minefield ?
worry not here 's a handy or hairy , oof guide .
the skinny indie man bun radiobedhead .
orru/rex features/luigi orru / rex features the skinny indie man bun is slight and delicate and is skeptical about streaming , as sported by thom yorke and the popular indie band known as editors .
particularly handy for keeping your hair out of your eyes while performing .

the hollywood man bun it 's all about dynamics with the hollywood : mainly , a slicked back knot or a pony bun as it 's been called taut to show off the lack of wrinkles but looser at the back , teamed with a fuller beard and a beautiful face .
the samurai internet surely the only time that you can say harry styles ' and samurai ' in the same sentence , this half-up half-down hair do is the original top knot .
it 's smooth enough to work in a mayfair club and quirky enough to suggest there 's more going on than getting your greasy fringe out of your face .
girls , however , do not like it .
the nest man bun less a man bun , more of a man mess , this is not the sort of hairstyle that you want to get stuck next to on the tube or at a gig .
it probably smells of wheatgrass and vegan smoothies and bristol , as sported by alex ebert from edward sharpe and the magnetic zeroes and his bare-footed ilk .

documents.title: breaking : thom yorke takes on the internet
text: solo yolo .
arnold/wireimage the press release for the thom yorke solo record is so fun we thought we 'd copy and paste it all here and let you have it .
thom yorke tomorrow 's modern boxes .
as an experiment we are using a new version of bittorrent to distribute a new thom yorke record .
the new torrent files have a pay gate to access a bundle of files .
the files can be anything , but in this case is an album ' .

it 's an experiment to see if the mechanics of the system are something that the general public can get its head around if it works well it could be an effective way of handing some control of internet commerce back to people who are creating the work .
enabling those people who make either music , video or any other kind of digital content to sell it themselves .
bypassing the self elected gate-keepers .
if it works anyone can do this exactly as we have done .
the torrent mechanism does not require any server uploading or hosting costs or cloud ' malarkey .
it 's a self-contained embeddable shop front the network not only carries the traffic , it also hosts the file .
the file is in the network .
oh yes and it 's called tomorrow 's modern boxes .
thom yorke & nigel godrich update : you can stream the first track , brain in a bottle , right here .

documents.title: skepta x ratking
text: it 's been a great week for grime , what with wiley returning with a new single yesterday .

now fader have just premiered this remix of skepta 's that 's not me featuring a guest rap from wiki of new york punk hip-hoppers ratking ( read our interview with ratking right here btw ) and a video that sees them skinning up and partying on a rootop overlooking the big apple .
grime has n't had a crossover success in the us as yet but fader suggest this could well be the track to nudge it overground .
we 're down .

documents.title: lovely links
text: it 's time for us to do one of those roundups to help you waste the rest of your day .
jai paul , rocking the croissant-bun hairdo way before sam smith .
a thing in the news for the 130 people that still care abnout jai paul ( us included ) xl boss richard russell has spoken out about elusive r & b producer jai paul in a recent pitchfork interview .

theories about what has happened to jai paul include that he 's actually in jungle , he shaved off all his hair and lives a simple life with his pet racoon in camberwell and boring that he 's actually in the studio recording his debut album .
but it 's good to know he 's out there somewhere and that he 's okay .
something about new web seriesvulture say you should watch this lot .
we 're inclined to agree .
a bit of polemic about vinyl buyingthe guardian 's pete paphides is well up for buying vinyl in urban outfitters .
the best new dj mixes for your earholesthanks to fact magazine , who do this sort of thing every friday , for when you want to pretend your desk is a dank corner of berghain .
music telly that is actually goodmusic telly is rarely done right these days but channel 4 appear to be onto a good thing with this new series , four to the floor .
the first episode features an animated version of us rapper joey bada $ $ .

documents.title: it 's # reviewanything time
text: we literally will review anything .
shaw/review anything today 's # reviewanything where we review anything and everything you send us , be it music or your knitting is a corker .
we listened to an emo eminem , dived into seapunk and pruned our bushes with an alternative gardening blog .
click here for precisely six lols .

documents.title: not a spoof , just labeouf
text: shia is said to have taken inspiration from mid-2000s nu-rave for his running look .

jumelet/epa hollywood actor shia labeouf is at it again after so far getting arrested for disrupting a broadway show and titting around in a brown paper bag this year this time in purple leggings and making what he calls performance art ' by doing 144 laps of the stedelijk museum in amsterdam .
do we need to stage an intervention ?
can marina abramoviä step in and have a quiet word ?
can we never see a of shia labeouf in purple leggings just before lunchtime again ?
thanks everyone .

documents.title: this dfa 1979 doc looks good
text: death from above 1979 are one of those cult bands who inspire mad-love from their fans , so much so that one of them kicked a police horse to get into the duo 's comeback show at south by south west some years back .
this doc goes some way to explain why they split up , why they inspire such crazy and why they never quite made it , with interviews from yeah yeah yeahs , metric , justice and more .
it 's out on 7 october on vimeo on demand .

documents.title: thor turns hacker
text: according to michael mann , who has made a film called blackhat , hackers tend to look like thor aka chris hemsworth aka a body of pure muscle with a nice face and shiny highlights .

complete lack of realism sticky keyboard , tissue-strewn bedroom , last week 's boxers aside , though , it looks marvellous and there 's a very lovely ( though not new ) cover of knockin ' on heaven 's door by antony and the johnsons in there , too .

documents.title: tat 's not alright ?
text: in today 's ridiculous celeb tat news , drake has become the latest member of the emoji ink club , joining miley cyrus and her crying kitty .
he 's been snapped by tattoo artist doctor woo in la with the praying hands ' emoji on his forearms .
could this be the 2010s answer to the tribal tattoo ' or the graceful cursive script ' ?

bulletin.text: Welcome to Friday. Stay seated, activate your scrolling finger, and watch as the best pop culture funnies crop up here during the day.
Still to come: a Death From Above 1979 doc, man buns, Jai Paul Watch and #ReviewAnything returns.
Send in your submissions to be crushed under our critical boot: @twitterid.
